amendment.description: An amendment numbered 111 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funding for the Interagency Working Group on the Social Cost of Greenhouse Gases.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.
